com.anaplan.client.transport

Class FeignApiRetryer

  • java.lang.Object
    • feign.Retryer.Default
      • com.anaplan.client.transport.FeignApiRetryer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    feign.Retryer, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class FeignApiRetryer
extends feign.Retryer.Default
    Feign retryer that emulates Spring's BackoffExponentialPolicy for setting intervals/periods between attempts.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • continueOrPropagate

        public void continueOrPropagate(feign.RetryableException e)
        Straight up ripped from Retryer.Default because nextMaxInterval is not polymorphic and hence not overridable. Otherwise would have invoked super.continueOrPropagate(e, lambda...)
